Hi! I'm Enio

I’m a multidisciplinary designer specialized in UI design and visual identities.

I've graduated from Faculty of Graphic Art at the University of Zagreb in 2016 and have a Master's degree in Graphic Technology.

During the last two years of college, I have volunteered in a student organization eSTUDENT where I worked as a Graphic designer in a Team for Visual Communication. This gave me opportunity to work on projects like Elektroboj, Financial Week, App Start Contest and other.

In 2015 I started working as a lead designer at Mondo.hr Internet Supershop which was a part of 24sata, Styria Group. My responsibilities included creating visuals for website, eCommerce campaigns, Facebook promotional images and web banners. In January of 2017 I started working as a web designer at 24sata.hr, in the department of Digital and Project media solutions.

In January 2018 I decided to leave 24sata so I could focus more on UI design and developing visual identities. I started working as a designer in M+ Agency, digital agency now known as Younited Agency where I primarily work on the development of logotypes and visual identities, as well as designing websites for a large number of clients.

Things I like the most about graphic design are typography, grids and finding the perfect color scheme. Besides keeping up with design trends, I love to play video games, endlessly drink coffee and play with my dog Emmy (the lady on the photo).

I’m always open to exciting job opportunities, with my Curriculum Vitae available below.

Contact

If you like what I do, feel free to contact me via e-mail, or check my social media links.

ejergovic@gmail.com
